title: Lesson 02 - One Minute Irish
description: In lesson 2 of One Minute Irish you will learn how to answer 'dia duit' when someone says it to you. You'll also learn how to say 'please' and 'thank you'. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Irish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com
